title: [Self-Directed] Foreign Language (Chinese) Learning Design Using LLM-Based Gamified Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese Vocabulary and Grammar Knowledge at HSK Level 3
context.additional_context: VR simulation environment focusing on acquiring practical Chinese expressions for workplace scenarios, aligned with science-related job functions

learning_goals: Learners improve accuracy in using basic science vocabulary (e.g., lab tools, units) by over 30% after 10+ interactions with an LLM tutor in VR environments.
Learners apply work-related expressions (e.g., safety protocols, data reporting) with over 80% accuracy using context-specific feedback from an LLM tutor during simulation tasks.
Learners independently attempt problem-solving strategies five or more times when non-content interactions (e.g., technical support requests) occur in-game.

resources: Science Domain Contextual Chinese Content Package

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
